title: Along the Way
content:
Along the way is an area .

When a path card is drawn, it is placed along the way if the arrow in the upper lefthand corner of the card is pointing up.

Ready cards along the way are always considered active during Step 5 of performing a test.

Thematically, being and features that are along the way affect all Rangers equally, whether that be an irix circling overhead or an overgrown thicket that must be traversed on the way to the Rangers' destination.
